title=\"\">\n</picture>                 </a>\n                  <div class=\"teaser_main\">\n              <span class=\"grid_topic\">Crackberry Digital Offers</span>\n            <h2 class=\"grid_title\"><a href=\"/these-go-x3-bluetooth-headphones-let-you-get-active-your-favorite-tunes\">Grab these GO-X3 Bluetooth headphones at 50% off!</a></h2>\n              <span class=\"grid_time\">18 April 2017</span>\n                          <span class=\"grid_author\">By <a data-luid=\"1\" data-pid=\"d_cb\" class=\"mp-username-disabled author\" href=\"/author/crackberry\">CrackBerry</a></span>\n                        <span class=\"grid_summary\">Looking for Bluetooth headphones that won't fall out of your ears as soon as you start moving? How about headphones with a strong battery and great sound? Check out these from ARMOR-X; right now, they're only $30.</span>\n              </div>\n          </div><div class=\"grid_item visor-article-teaser list_featured\">\n                <a class=\"grid_img\" href=\"/grab-set-wired-stereo-headphones-just-65-today\">\n          <picture>\n<!--[if IE 9]><video style=\"display: none;\"><![endif]-->\n<source srcset=\"https://crackberry.com/sites/crackberry.com/files/styles/w800h450crop/public/article_images/2017/04/l26355-ac.jpg?itok=kTsvDUeG&amp;timestamp=1492443749 1x\" media=\"(min-width:800px)\">\n<source srcset=\"https://crackberry.com/sites/crackberry.com/files/styles/w400h225crop/public/article_images/2017/04/l26355-ac.jpg?itok=JaUBV5BF&amp;timestamp=1492443749 1x\" media=\"(min-width:0px)\">\n<!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]-->\n<img src=\"https://crackberry.com/sites/crackberry.com/files/styles/w800h450crop/public/article_images/2017/04/l26355-ac.jpg?itok=kTsvDUeG&amp;timestamp=1492443749\" alt=\"\" title=\"\">\n</picture>                 </a>\n                  <div class=\"teaser_main\">\n              <span class=\"grid_topic\">Deal of the Day</span>\n            <h2 class=\"grid_title\"><a href=\"/grab-set-wired-stereo-headphones-just-65-today\">Grab a set of wired stereo headphones for just $6 today</a></h2>\n              <span class=\"grid_time\">18 April 2017</span>\n                          <span class=\"grid_author\">By <a data-luid=\"3571924\" data-pid=\"d_cb\" class=\"mp-username-disabled author\" href=\"/author/shopcrackberry\">ShopCrackBerry</a></span>\n                        <span class=\"grid_summary\">Need a set of basic headphones for listening to music and taking calls while on the go?
